events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under the engineering cluster focused on software development roles.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's application moving forward.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well, where we discussed their software engineering experience and skills.
The candidate responded promptly confirming their availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
We have scheduled the candidate's technical interview to assess their coding and problem-solving skills in software development.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong engineering knowledge and practical coding abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's fit within the team culture and company policies.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with positive feedback regarding the candidate's communication and professionalism.
An official job offer for the software engineer role has been proposed to the candidate including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the job offer and asked a few questions about the onboarding process.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is enthusiastic about joining the engineering team.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including account setups and introduction to the development team.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the candidate now fully integrated into the engineering team.
